abstract.para: The Packaging Guide provides an explanation of &DSCL;s and details how to build and package them. Developers and system administrators who have a basic understanding of software packaging with RPM packages, but who are new to the concept of &DSCL;s, can use this Guide to get started with &DSCL;s.
